infotexts.faction.Touhou_Gensokyo.description: Is it a fantasy, or a castle in the air? Until dawn, this dream, the butterfly's dream
infotexts.faction.Touhou_Gensokyo.shortdescription: The World in the Illusory Morning Mist
infotexts.entitydescription.touhousprayer: Sprayer that paints Touhou stickers on walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliagear: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned the dress scarlet, hence it's called "Scarlet Devil."‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Plus: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood has turned the dress scarlet, hence it's called "Scarlet Devil."‖color:end‖\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖Note: After wearing, be sure to check the talent menu~‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodpackB: Not much different from a regular blood pack, but it's particularly delicious for vampires.
infotexts.talentdescription.demonkingcradle:
When wearing the ‖color:gui.orange‖Remilia's Outfit+‖end‖ and using ‖color:gui.orange‖Premium Type-B Blood‖end‖, you gain: 
Ongoing healing of ‖color:gui.orange‖Bite Wounds‖end‖. 
‖color:gui.green‖+20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Movement Speed‖end‖. 
Gain ‖color:gui.orange‖Insanity Resistance‖end‖ and increased damage output. 
When you kill any creature, you recover ‖color:gui.green‖2%‖end‖ Bloodloss and ‖color:gui.green‖8%‖end‖ Bleeding. 

‖color:150,150,150,255‖Remilia follows the same rule, being a severe egoist. Type-B blood is the tastiest. 

———— From "Imperishable Night"‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Demon_King_Cradle: "It would be even better with Sakuya's tea~"
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliapaint:
A can of Remilia-themed paint, used with the Touhou Sprayer.
‖color:255,36,0,255‖Remilia resides in the Scarlet Devil Mansion.
Located by a lake in Gensokyo, there is a red house.
She is the mistress of the place.
———— From "Imperishable Night"‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliadecalmask: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖Surprisingly nice to wear on your face.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Gungnier_Spear: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖Just a shadow of Gungnir, but still the shadow of Gungnir (Use it in the Civilian Version of the Gungnir Spear).‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmugear: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener and fencing instructor working and living at Hakugyokurou. She’s half-ghost, half-human, which might explain why she carries two swords. ‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Plus: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener and fencing instructor working and living at Hakugyokurou. She’s half-ghost, half-human, which might explain why she carries two swords, though this outfit seems to be stronger. ‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmupaint: A spray can of Youmu Paint for the Touhou Sprayer. No one knows how it works, but you can see something resembling a small spirit moving around. \n‖color:156,158,161,255‖Roukanken's sheath has a cherry blossom flower on top of it.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmusmg: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖"How can Patchouli create something like this in this planet... she really is a genius." - Coalition Scientist‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Smgmagazine: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖Bullets of the Netherworld, capable of penetrating most armors on Europa (can be used in SMG-type weapons).‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuceremonialsword: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖The Roukanken blade is said to have been forged by Youkais and is able to kill ten ghosts in one swing. No one knows if this claim is true, though, as people can’t see ghosts.\n"A memento of Cherry Blossoms."‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuwatermelon: The latest result of hydroponic technology on Europa. Unfortunately, it only fills the stomach and cannot heal injuries.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c1:
It's another typical day on Europa. The noisy station, the moving crowds, and your damn headache... You think as you pass through the station's airlock.

However, as you climb the ladder and enter the station, a strange sense of discomfort draws your attention.

The source of this discomfort is a girl who seems to be meditating — she looks about ten years old, her delicate face surpassing even the most exaggerated propaganda of the Europa Union about their leaders, and her silver hair oddly reminds you of the light reflected off a shipwreck's porthole. Shaking your head to dismiss this ominous thought, you notice that she has two sword sheaths at her waist, but they both appear to be empty.

You can't help but feel curious, who exactly is this girl who seems so out of place here?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c2:
You are about to approach her, but the seemingly unguarded girl lifts her head first.

For a moment, you see a treasure sword about to be drawn — unlike the bloodstained boarding axes of the security officers or the ceremonial swords of the assistants adorned with stripes and sashes, the girl before you feels like a blade forged from the icy coldness of the ocean, sharpened over countless years, a weapon that cannot be wielded by mere humans. Neither blood nor spirits would leave any trace on that flawless blade.

For a brief moment, you have no doubt that she could cut you, along with the station you stand on, in two — even though her sword sheaths are empty.

"Do you have a watermelon?" The girl's voice is as clear as you imagined, crisp yet with a slight clang, like the sharp light of a sword cutting through flying cherry blossoms — wait, watermelon?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3: "It's a round fruit with a green rind and black stripes... Could you please help me find one?" The girl shyly asks you.\n\nYou finally snap back to reality — the girl before you seems to be more approachable than you thought.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.o3: Check if you have what she wants.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c1: You happen to be carrying a watermelon, and the girl seems very pleased. However, she quickly frowns, as if troubled about how to ask something.\n\n"It's like this, I got lost while chasing that rabbit, and now I don't know where I am... Could you give me a ride?"
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o1: "It would be my honor, Miss Youmu Konpaku."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o1.c1: The girl looks relieved, "Thank you!" She runs towards your submarine. Wait... did she tell you her name?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o2.c1: You were about to brush her off with this, but this is Youmu! How could you not let her join? Could anyone really be heartless enough to refuse?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2: After some rummaging, it seems you don't have a watermelon on you. Looking up, the girl is waiting for your response.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.o1: "Sorry, I don't think I have what you're looking for. But I can try to find one..."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.c1: The girl sighs slightly and then ignores you. "What should I do, Lady Yuyuko will..." You seem to hear her muttering something as you leave. Speaking of watermelons, maybe the station's vending machines have some?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.c1: Thanks to that strange feeling, you easily find the girl in the station.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.o1: "Hello, I got the watermelon you wanted..."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.o1.c2: You were about to say this, but then you remember you don't actually have a watermelon on you.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.o2: "Sorry, I don't think I have what you're looking for. Let's go our separate ways."
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Temple: There's almost nothing that can't be cut.
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Plus: ‖color:255,255,0,255‖Just an Ordinary Magician, though this set of clothes seem to be of higher quality‖color:end‖(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.talentdescription.Casket_Of_Star:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Marisa's Outfit+‖end‖: 
Recover faster from‖color:gui.green‖physical injuries and burns.‖end‖ 
The ‖color:gui.green‖damage dealt ‖end‖is increased. 
The‖color:gui.green‖ firerate of all guns ‖end‖is increased.
infotexts.entitydescription.ayagear:
‖color:255,255,255,255‖Aya Shameimaru is a crow tengu, one of the fastest among the tengu. She carries a camera and runs around Gensokyo, recording various interesting events.
Although she is a crow tengu, her appearance is not much different from that of a human.
————《Perfect Memento in Strict Sense》‖color:end‖
(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Plus:
‖color:255,255,255,255‖Aya Shameimaru is a crow tengu, one of the fastest among the tengu. She carries a camera and runs around Gensokyo, recording various interesting events.
Although she is a crow tengu, her appearance is not much different from that of a human.
————《Perfect Memento in Strict Sense》‖color:end‖
(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Wind_God_Girl: Reading more newspapers makes you more informed about current events.
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_News: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖This newspaper is perfect for passing time on a boring afternoon with a cup of tea, and thus it can be sold at a good price.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Circular_Fan: A fan in the shape of maple leaves, very popular among crow tengu.
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Maple_Leaves: The fan is a tool for creating wind. One wave can blow down a house, two waves can knock down a tree, and three waves can blow away a traveler's cloak.(Aya's Fan Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_gear:
‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine, located within Gensokyo.
————《Perfect Memento in Strict Sense》.
She usually resides at the Hakurei Shrine but can also be found throughout Gensokyo and even outside of it when there is work or an incident.‖color:end‖
(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Plus:
‖color:255,81,75,255‖Reimu Hakurei is the current shrine maiden of the Hakurei Shrine, located within Gensokyo.
————《Perfect Memento in Strict Sense》.
She usually resides at the Hakurei Shrine but can also be found throughout Gensokyo and even outside of it when there is work or an incident.‖color:end‖
(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Paint: A can of Reimu's decal paint, to be used with the Touhou Sprayer.\n‖color:255,81,75,255‖When visiting the shrine, you don't need to bring incense money; just bring some food or sake. Because of this, the offertory box is often empty...‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Decalmask: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Surprisingly, it looks pretty good on your face.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Gear: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a Kappa, she is very sensitive to business opportunities.\n Whenever Gensokyo holds a slightly large-scale festival or rally, she and other Kappas can often be seen hawking at the scene.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Plus: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a Kappa, she is very sensitive to business opportunities.\n Whenever Gensokyo holds a slightly large-scale festival or rally, she and other Kappas can often be seen hawking at the scene.‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Candid_Friend: Some Kappas are good at trading and saving their money.
infotexts.talentdescription.Kappa_Pororoca: While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Nitori's Outfit+‖end‖, Repair Speed increases by ‖color:gui.green‖+150%.‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_gear: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The Scholar of the Ninth Generation can often be seen at Suzunaan borrowing books. She has an impressive Eidetic Memory, earning her the name of "Memory of Gensokyo".‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_Plus: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The Scholar of the Ninth Generation can often be seen at Suzunaan borrowing books. She has an impressive Eidetic Memory, earning her the name of "Memory of Gensokyo".‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_gear: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Originally the daughter of a noble family, Mokou became an immortal human after drinking the Hourai's Elixir left by Houraisan Kaguya. Whenever Mokou sees Kaguya, they begin an endless slaughter with one another.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_Plus: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Originally the daughter of a noble family, Mokou became an immortal human after drinking the Hourai's Elixir left by Houraisan Kaguya. Whenever Mokou sees Kaguya, they begin an endless slaughter with one another.‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Immortal_Human:
While wearing ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Mokou's Outfit+‖end‖: Once per round, after your health reaches zero,‖color:gui.green‖you have an additional 30 seconds of life.‖end‖
 However, it will also temporarily decrease your movement speed and cause damage all around you, causing all your injuries to rapidly recover. 
 When causing ‖color:gui.green‖Phoenix Burn‖end‖, there is an additional ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖damage bonus. 
 Having more enemies around will increase your total damage up to a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Sunnu_Scary_Mask: Although it's supposed to be a test of courage, it seems that no one has been scared.
infotexts.entitydescription.gensokyo_divinggear: A magical aura that protects the human body
infotexts.entitydescription.Ether_Divinggear: This diving suit, produced with Patchouli's magic, is based on the idea of mythical beings called mermaids, half-human half-fish individuals that seem to be immune to the pressure of the depths of the ocean.\n While not perfect yet, it's capable of protect the user from water pressure up to 7000 meters.\nThis should go without saying, but after scientists witnessed the ease with which their best diving suits were replicated without Patchouli putting any effort into it, declaring they were left speechless would be underselling it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Power_Point: With these items, replication of the strongest gear is made possible.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Material: A magical substance synthesized from various alien materials. It is said to be named after an album, but what is its purpose? (It cannot be worn on the head)
infotexts.entitydescription.Mc_SnowBall: What the hell is this doing here? Huh? An icicle? What are you talking about?
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Stone: A Stone with weak magical aura, synthesized from special materials. It's very important in the creation of Touhou equipment.
infotexts.entitydescription.Spiritual_Water: Water with extremely weak magical aura. It can extract the traces of magic left behind in Europa's water, so it's an easy refill method.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Dust: Magic materials obtained from ordinary materials through irreversible rituals. They dissolve in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Dust_Caking: The product of Reiki dust after preliminary processing. It's not soluble and has magical properties. Somehow.
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Doll: It can carry Remilia Paint. When held, it can slowly heal injuries.\n When held, right-clicking can double the effect.
infotexts.entitydescription.Maoyu_Duffel_Bag: The soft shell left behind after the Kedama's spirit departs.\n Eliminating Kedamas is difficult, as their spirits keep wandering in the form of duffel bags. Patchouli claimed to be "working" in a solution, but she just sleeps through the days.
infotexts.entitydescription.Plant_Essential_Oil: This essential oil extracted from plants can be used as Alchemy material and medicine to treat some common injuries.\nIt is said that the recipe came from a place called House of Eternity.
infotexts.entitydescription.Europa_Infusion: This infusion is obtained through complex processes has excellent magical effects. It can treat common injuries and strengthen the body.\nIt is said that the recipe came from a place called House of Eternity.
infotexts.entitydescription.Gilead_Branch_Seed: This mysterious plant grew on Europa at an unknown time, Patchouli determined that it may be a failed product of a mysterious Laboratory.
infotexts.entitydescription.Gilead_Branch: A branch that splits and falls during the autumn. It has certain medicinal value, but it needs complex processing to extract the key elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Balm_Of_Gilead: This ointment made by magic process through Gilead branchs and plant essential oils has powerful therapeutic effect, but pay attention to its use. Improper application might lead to rapid death.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Incense: A piece of incense of unknown origin circulates in a small amount in the market and can relieve the body and mind for a full 24 hours after its ignition. However, according to Patchouli, this seems to be a rather stupid usage.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Peach: This peach of unknown origin looks sweet and tempting. Every time you see it, you wonder what effects it may have, if any.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hakkero: This is a Mini Hakkero with an octagonal shaped appearance, with an Eight Trigrams pattern, and a hole in the middle. Seems something must be inserted for it to work properly.
infotexts.entitydescription.StarDanmu: Patchouli says it's an important piece of the Mini Hakkero. She also modified the formula for this item slightly to make it compatible with charging stations. Talk about QoL!
infotexts.entitydescription.Stardust_Reverie: From the appearance alone, looks like Star Barrage with a different color.
infotexts.entitydescription.Fake_Hakkero: A poor imitation of Hakkero, but it imitates it nonetheless.
infotexts.entitydescription.Homing_Amulet: A stack of amulets that seemingly contain magical power, though no one seems knows how to use them. Patchouli says that adding magic materials can get it to work, though scientists are unsure of what she meant.
infotexts.entitydescription.Freeze_Icicle_Fall: A large piece of ice overflowing with magic. Wait... is that a frog? (Rechargeable in water)
infotexts.entitydescription.Blunderbuss: Both a lunar relic and an unstable mess. Might cause wounds to the user and seems to operate with other lunar relics.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mind_Bullet: A lunar relic of unimaginable power.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lunatic_Bullet: A lunar relic said to be capable of bringing God himself to his knees.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Gungnier: "And as Odin pointed his spear to the skies, even Ymir, Útgarða and the mightiest of warriors were obliterated, helpless to do anything against his might."
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_Flamer: A tool that can produce a vigorous flame even in the icy cold of Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.Phoenix_Tail: Thanks to Patchouli, mass-producing the Phoenix's Tail has become affordable.\n Recently acclaimed in the immortality industry as a convenient alternative to searching for the Elixir of Life.\n It is more convenient to entrust one's life to these inexpensive pharmaceutical products.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hisou_Sword: By using the Sword of Hisou, one can accurately strike the opponent's weak point.\n Only a celestial being can wield the Sword of Hisou.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sakuya_Knife: Lightweight weapons that are easy to carry and throw.
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuceremonialsword2: This ancestral bloodline relic can only be wielded by the Konpaku family and can sever confusion. When asking Patchouli what this means, all she did was sigh audibly and say "You're a big bunch of incompetents."
infotexts.entitydescription.Thousand_Needle_Ammo: Those who do not comply will swallow a thousand needles. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Phoenix_Wings_Ammo: In the middle of flames as hot as the sun, the Phoenix rises from the ashes. (Pulse Laser Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Milky_Way_Ammo: The star sand is colorful and gorgeous. (Coilgun Ammo)"
infotexts.entitydescription.Yin_Yang_Spirit_Orb: No, but seriously, where's the orb!? (Railgun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Broom: ‖color:255,255,0,255‖This broom made by the Ordinary Magician can somehow propel its user through water. It's so handy, you can even use two at the same time!‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Power_Bank: A charging bank working with unknown principles. It's been shorting out and leaking electricity due to Aya's refusing Patchouli's help. It can still power most batteries, though.
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Backpack: The backpacks of the Kappa can hold many items while also having other wonderful functions, even withstanding water pressure up to 3600 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kappa_Backpack_Plus: Although the capacity of the upgraded version of the Kappa's backpack has not increased, Patchouli has imbued a powerful magic in it that can protect users to a certain extent, and even resist water pressure up to 6000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kappa_Miningdrill: The mining tools of Kappa have many advantages, such as portability, ease of operation, durability and so on. Unfortunately, batteries rarely last longer than a few seconds when using this tool.
infotexts.entitydescription.Illness_Recovery_Charm: A healing talisman from the Moriya Shrine. (Headset Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Base_Metal: This magical metal can be used for the synthesis of basic materials.\nPatchouli's insistence has led to the Europa military officially adopting this metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mu_Alchemical: A bottle of purified Wood elements, an excellent alchemical product.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Altar: A table prepared for magic rituals. (Press E to pick up.)
infotexts.entitydescription.Alchemy_Table: A table prepared for alchemy, capable of performing various complex alchemical operations. (Press E to pick up)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.empty.infotext: Insert magic materials for alchemy. Refer to 'Patchouli's Manual' for instructions.\n (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Research.Infotext: The stages of alchemy for transforming substances. With Patchouli's guidance, this step can now be easily completed on the alchemy table. (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.).
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Combine.Missingitem: Mixed with base metals and infused with various materials of different properties to achieve alchemical transformation. (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reimilia_Weapons: The ability to manipulate the degree of control over one's destiny.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bai_Lou_Swo: This ancestral bloodline relic can only be wielded by the Konpaku family and can sever confusion. When asking Patchouli what this means, all she did was sigh audibly and say "You're a big bunch of incompetents."
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bai_Lou_And: Konpaku Youmu is a master of dual-wielding, and both her swords have very unusual uses. Of course, both swords can also be used for ordinary slashing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Marisa_Hakk: The ability to manipulate different levels of magic.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Side_Effect_: The rejection caused by the body's immune system makes the Reiki inside you become chaotic.
The situation is getting worse, and you feel sharp pains coming from inside your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Pressure: The unfriendly Reiki destroys your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Essential_Oil_Appl: The injury at the injured position has been relieved, but the pain is difficult to dissipate.
Essential oil with special properties covers the injured position to help recover.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Yummy_Peach: The deliciousness of peaches can only be known by tasting them, savor every bite!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Phoenix_Burn: The scars left by being burned by Mokou's flames always give people a false sense of invincibility.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aura_Strip: When your Aura is forcibly taken away, you feel that your physical condition has inexplicably deteriorated a lot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Resurrection: It's just an unremarkable everyday routine.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lost_Dream: You have found that your past dreams are gradually fading away, and you can no longer remember them, resulting in a decline in your physical condition.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Elements_Book: A magic book containing records of elemental conversion and combination, able to quickly switch between elements at a moment's notice. Patchouli explained that only magicians with years of practice can use its full power. \n(Elemental Generation requires a Philosopher Stone. [Imitation works.] Elemental Generation will remove the original content.)
infotexts.entitydescription.Kanameishi_Cannon: Whether creating an earthquake or stopping it, only the Hinanawa clan can do it. (Flak Cannon Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Immortal_Moon_Smoke: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spell_Book: A book detailing all kinds of magic. Take the time to study it, and you'll gain very important knowledge.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Veil: A veil designed by Patchouli for the situations that call for its usage. Improves the user's affinity for magic and resists pressure up to 8000 meters. \nUnfortunately, Marisa interrupted Patchouli's magic incantation and as a result, the veil has a lack of physical defense and it makes using electrical items much harder.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Veil02: A veil designed by Patchouli for the situations that call for its usage. Improves the user's affinity for magic and resists pressure up to 8000 meters. \nUnfortunately, Marisa interrupted Patchouli's magic incantation and as a result, the veil has a lack of physical defense and it makes using electrical items much harder.
infotexts.afflictionname.Mokou_Weapons: The Immortal Guide of the Bamboo Forest
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Mokou_Weapons: A dissipated soul cannot be brought back to life. However, hers is immortal. The universe won't allow her soul to find another vessel, but she doesn't need to find one. Her soul will always create a new vessel for her, no matter what.\nThis doesn't mean she's not hungry or in pain, though.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Marisa_Weapons: A girl whose destiny is to be a magician who lives away from the crowds. Her weapon is magic, and her life is a game.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_De: You feel as if undercurrent magic is surging through your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_Bu: You feel as if healing energy is coursing through your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_1: No breathing difficulties or symptoms at all. Better control the situation while you can.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_2: Scratchy throat, cough, and breathing becomes slightly difficult. Exacerbation is about to happen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_3: The pain and symptoms are worsening rapidly. Coughing is very painful, and you can barely breathe.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_4: Gradually recovering. If the symptoms are not treated, your condition will worsen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Budesonide_: Windpipe inflammation is subsiding and the asthma symptoms are relieving.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Budesonide: A drug for treating Asthma. Won't cause side-effects if used correctly.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_MEID:
A potion that temporarily strengthens the body. It might bring long-term strengthening after use.
This is the result of Patchouli's research in order to adapt her body to Europa's environment. 
Some say it's like being used as a puppet, as if their body stopped belonging to them. 
"No, I'm not complaining, I'm just saying that it might be uncomfortable for some." - Test Subject#3
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Branch: This mysterious branch appeared in Europa at some point, and has become popular because of its unique pleasant smell.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Branch_Seed: Obtaining and caring for this seed and its sprout is said to be very difficult. It's also said to have a very low yield, though the smell of its branches are more than worth it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hyouibana_Dream: Using this will let another character possess you and obtain the corresponding talents and abilities. (Weakened effects)
infotexts.entitydescription.Huo_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified fire elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tu_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified earth elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Jin_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified gold elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mu_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified water elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yang_Alchemical: Don't shake the bottle unless you want to witness the unrivaled power of the nucleus of the sun.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yin_Alchemical: Just staring at the contents can give you peace of mind.
infotexts.entitydescription.Seven_Elements_Alchemi: Although an imitation, its magical capabilities are still working.

The structure and principles of such a legendary creation are beyond the understanding of even the finest of Europa's scientists, but for Patchouli, this is just an ordinary item.\nIts energy can regenerate as long as it's not being supressed by the icy deep sea.
infotexts.entitydescription.Byproduct_Alchemical: Just garbage leftover from alchemy, though a skilled alchemist wouldn't let this happen in the first place.
infotexts.entitydescription.Baka_Horn: Doesn't seem any different from clown horns, but the sound is rather unique.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: "Struggle all you want. In the end, not even the strongest of winters can resist the scorching sun. (Pulse Laser Ammo)"
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Silent_Selene_A: The cold silent moonlight stares into the distance every broken night. (Coilgun Ammo)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: Your body is as hot as the the very sun itself, and you feel like your entire body is melting from inside out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Silent_Sele: Your body is as cold as the Boomerang Nebula, and you feel like even the slightest of movements will break your entire body apart.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Magic_Destruction: The faint magic power in your body was completely destroyed and your ability to move normally is severely impaired.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rib_Injury: Seems like a part of your rib is missing.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hompson_Contender: A handgun with a long history. Rumors say it's been taken after the death of a certain mage that could control time within his body, now has a strange bunny smell.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Origin_Bullet: These bullets for the Contender have been obtained through complex and incredibly painful magical processes. It is said they target a mage's mana, spiraling it out of control and making it forever useless. \nBeing grazed by just one of these bullets is enough to bring a mage's power to an end, and no one is excempt from this rule. Not even Patchouli.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stability: This medicine uses the most efficient method to treat spiritual energy disorders. Might cause addictions.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Foul_Potion: A poison made from alchemical byproducts.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stabi: The severe pain in your body is midly alleviated.
The severe pain in your body has almost faded away.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Apple: Fortunately, this was harvested in time, preventing it from becoming a bad apple. Truly one of the fruits ever.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Golden_Carrot: A lucky charm. Also good if you need food saturation.
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_gear: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖The mage of the Scarlet Devil Mansion's underground library. She has spent most of her life researching and developing new magic, creating books with specific instructions to recreate the magic. An indisputable genius. ‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_Plus: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖The mage of the Scarlet Devil Mansion's underground library. She has spent most of her life researching and developing new magic, creating books with specific instructions to recreate the magic. An indisputable genius. ‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.talentdescription.Knowledge_And_Solitude:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Patchouli's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
As your health gets lower, increases the affliction rate of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Asthma‖end‖. 
Swimming speed increased by ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖ 
Running on land becomes impossible and walking speed is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ 
Maximum HP decreased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ 
Increase skill gain speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ 
Increase the effectiveness of the five elements by ‖color:gui.green‖300%‖end‖ 
Increases the damage of Spiritual Pressure by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Become more susceptible to injuries and blood loss.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Still_Library: She looks just like a normal human. A slim body and pale skin. Her asthma and anemia limits her abilities somewhat.
infotexts.afflictionname.Patchouli_Weapons: The Witch of the Scarlet Devil Mansion
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Weapons: Patchouli is a good friend of Remilia. They'll ocassionally nickname each other and drink tea together.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_gear: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖As a member of the Hinanawi clan, she can control keystones to create or stop earthquakes, creating landslide disasters and even shake the foundation of Gensokyo itself.‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Plus: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖As a member of the Hinanawi clan, she can control keystones to create or stop earthquakes, creating landslide disasters and even shake the foundation of Gensokyo itself.‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Hat: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖"It would look too boring if was just a plain hat, so I added some peaches to it."‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.TenshiTalent:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi's Outfit+‖end‖: 
Being hit with a melee attack will cause the enemy to run away for a short duration. 
Increases the effect of Aura Stripping by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖. 
Increases the resistance to Aura Stripping by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. 
After eating a Java Apple, greatly increases damage resistance for ‖color:gui.green‖15s‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Daughter_Of_He: The next in line to be the Emperor turned out to be a small girl. Red pupils and long blue hair. She's often seen wearing a black hat with edible peaches.
infotexts.afflictionname.Tenshi_Weapons: Scary Heavenly Beings Away From Their World
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Tenshi_Weapons: Although Tenshi doesn't have the character of an Emperor, she does have the qualities of one. Her body is so strong that not even a sword can cut her, and her body is a deadly poison to monsters.
infotexts.talentdescription.Innocent_Treasures:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Swimming speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖. 
Movement speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. 
Firerate is increased by‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. 
Skill gain speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
If a crewmate dies, you will not die from injuries for the duration of the round.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Magic_Boost: Your mana pool feels botomless and can be spent nigh infinitely.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sleepless_Nightmar: Otherwordly Nightmares have destroyed your mind and your body is much weaker.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Weakness: You feel dizzy and on the border of fainting.
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Star_Bottle: The starlight harvested over time gets highly compressed and then stored. This results in an impossibility to launch bombardments and can only be used for large-scale starlight magic. It feels like it takes forever to accumulate its power. \n"Hey, careful with that! You know how hard it is to collect star power under this freezing sea!?" - Marisa
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spell_Tutorial: A magic book tailored to beginners.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Flour: With help from Patchouli's knowledge and Kappa technology, Europans have access to some new basic crops. This flour comes from something called "wheat", and is mostly used to make delicacies which Patchouli claims are commonplace on Earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Fullmoon_Dumpli: Soft and sweet treat, widly popular with kids.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Fullmoon_Cake: Because of its special significance and appearance, the name "mooncake" was given to it. It has many different flavors which are topic of heated discussion. If you see a blue-haired dragon girl wielding red and black swords, this may just win her over.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Beer: A rare drink here in Europa. It's said to help with heartbreaks, but has become nigh impossible to attain as of lately. "Yuugi! YUUUUGIIIIIIII! Bring me more, moooooooooreeeee!" - Unnamed Japanese Goblin.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Winchester: An ancient earthen weapon, improved by the Kappas. Powerful and compatible with all shotgun ammo. Be mindful of your own skills, as wielding this without the necessary proficience might lead to terrible backlash.
infotexts.entitydescription.Exorcism_Bullet: Shotgun shells made of substances that monsters and youkais are afraid of. Causes increased damage to everything that is not human. Due to its special nature, they can only be used on the Kappa's Winchester.
infotexts.entitydescription.Fire_Element_Book: Disposable magic book imbued with magic. Perfect for novices.
infotexts.entitydescription.Water_Element_Book: Disposable magic book imbued with magic. Perfect for novices.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Concentrated_En: Due to Tenshi's strange request, this weapon made by the Kappas was wildly different from an ideal keystone, but its function of launching them satisfied her. The only volunteer to test this weapon disintegrated after using this while underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lightning_Kanameishi: Under special conditions, a keystone energized by electricity can be used as either an energy supply for the Concentrated Arc Emitter or for charging batteries. "This is unsulated... right?" - Deceased volunteer
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_Doll: Place any bottled element in the doll and it'll heal injuries as long as you hold it. Right-clicking doubles the effect. \nMukyu!
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase skill gain speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and repair speed by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖
Add ‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖ points to all skills. Unlocks the Full Moon Dumpling and Mooncake recipes.
Increase swimming speed by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, physical resistance is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖
After completing Lair clearing, Hunting, Cargo and Escort missions, you'll receive ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more experience.
After completing a round with nobody dying, obtain a ‖color:gui.orange‖Ether-layered Metal‖end‖.
Gradually increase your firerate, damage, swimming and walking speed up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ depending on your Magic level.
Damage dealt to non-humans is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and damage caused to non-hostile creatures is reduced by‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖.

You become ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ more resistant to being ragdolled by water pressure and your maximum health increases by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Exorcising Winchester‖end‖，and ‖color:gui.orange‖Pellets of Exorcism‖end‖ recipes.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet: After every round, if no crewmates died, everyone's ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burns, blood loss and Reaper's Tax‖end‖ is mildly cured.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Hermit: When attacked, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ chance of reducing ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ of the damage of the attack.
infotexts.talentdescription.Enter_Gensokyo: Resistance to Magic Destruction increases by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. Repaired equipment becomes more durable, but the quality of your crafting decreases by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level.
infotexts.talentdescription.Izakaya: Resistance to drunkeness increases by ‖color:gui.green‖80%‖end‖. Unlocks ‖color:gui.orange‖Beer‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ points to all skill at the end of the round. Unlocks ‖color:gui.orange‖Gensokyo Diving Gear‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Spell_Card_Recycle_Unl: Selling value of bottled elements is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖75%‖end‖. Unlocks much cheaper ‖color:gui.orange‖Royal Flare and Silent Selene‖end‖ recipes.
infotexts.talentdescription.Magic_Breakthrough: Increases the quality of all crafted items by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point while wearing Marisa+/Patchouli+/Flandre+ Outfits.
infotexts.talentdescription.Foul_Potion_Unlocked: Debuffs you apply have their duration increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Poisons you apply are‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ stronger. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Foul Potion‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Buff: Buffs you apply have their duration increased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖. Gain ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ poison resistance.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hermes: Increases attack damage, movement speed and damage resistance by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Philosopher Stone‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Traveling_Magician: After every round, if no crewmates died, obtain ‖color:gui.orange‖1 Magic Book‖end‖. Crewmates who have less than 6 levels will gain skill points ‖color:gui.orange‖20%‖end‖ faster.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Release: Become immune to water pressure, but the damage caused by Spiritual Pressure is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Convergence: Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，but resistance to Spiritual Pressure decreases by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Power_Point_Efficient_: Your crew is able to accept one extra mission, and reputation gained increases by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. You can now drag creatures at full speed. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖ P Point (Efficient)‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.MEID_Unlocked: Damage caused increases with the number of enemies around, while damage received decreases, up to ‖color:gui.green‖70%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ respectively. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Maid's Strengthener‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Origin Bomb‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Concentrated Arc Emitter‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electric Keystone‖end‖ recipes.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Aya: Movement speed and experience gained after each round are increased by 20% and 25% respectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Marisa: Increase damage dealt by 5%. Mildly increase resistance to normal and acidic burns.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Mokou: Increased resistance to Phoenix Burn. Recover faster from burns and physical wounds.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Reimu: Increases swimming speed by 20%. Increases walking speed by 10%. Increases skill gain speed by 50%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Remilia: Highly increases resistance to Husk infection and recovery from blood loss.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Youmu: Increases ground speed by 10%. Increases melee damage by 25%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Patchouli: Increases swimming speed by 25%. Increases skill gain speed by 25%. Medical items and buffs are 10% more efficient when used on you. Increases Mukyu chances by 5000%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Tenshi: Increases resistance to Aura Stripping and recover faster from it. Increases maximum HP by 10%. Further increases Java Apple's effects.
infotexts.missiondescription.cargoMagicItems: The alchemy laboratory has commissioned the transport of a batch of magical materials, but they don't seem to care much about it and appear to be focusing on something more important.
infotexts.missionmessage.cargoMagicItems: This sea area has temporarily calmed down.
infotexts.missiondescription.killMaoyu: The wool balls drifting in the sea, though they are almost harmless, always make the sonar cluttered with many spots, which can be unsettling. It's a mixed feeling when you realize they are just wool balls.
infotexts.missionmessage.killMaoyu: This sea area has temporarily calmed down.
infotexts.missiondescription.killghost: Due to some urban legend, this route is haunted by some very dangerous ghosts. Although they don't seem threatening at first glance, they have caused significant trouble for people on this route. Exercise caution during the clearing!
infotexts.missionsuccess.Tohou_Ghost_Line: The ghosts have vanished from the route.
infotexts.missionmessage.Tohou_Ghost_Line: May the souls that remain here wander in the night sky, lighting the way for you.
infotexts.missiondescription.killphotosphere: A large number of unidentified objects are drifting along this route. Witnesses claim that they are clearly not life forms native to this planet at first sight. Investigate what they really are.
infotexts.missionmessage.killphotosphere: It has been confirmed that these are not life forms native to this planet. Perhaps someone can identify their true nature.
infotexts.missiondescription.killgreenufo: No UFOs exist on Europa, investigate what is really going on.
infotexts.missionmessage.killgreenufo: The so-called UFO seems to be just some sort of disguise. The disturbance has temporarily subsided.
infotexts.missiondescription.killredufo: No UFOs exist on Europa, investigate what is really going on.
infotexts.missionmessage.killredufo: These red UFOs looked quite energized, perhaps related to their color.
infotexts.missiondescription.killblueufo: No UFOs exist on Europa, investigate what is really going on.
infotexts.missionmessage.killblueufo: Finally rid of these dangerous blue UFOs. Perhaps someone at the Myouren Temple knows the source of these things.
infotexts.entitydescription.Baka_grenade: Anyone hit by it is a fool!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Sorrow_Ter: Negative emotions from within are causing your mental state to become unstable.
infotexts.randomnews35: Dr. Patchouli says the rocket project will proceed as planned.
infotexts.randomnews36: Many people are still skeptical of the Tengu Task Force, fearing it will cause panic.
infotexts.randomnews37: The chief scientist publicly apologized to Dr. Patchouli about the existence of the Philosopher's Stone.
infotexts.randomnews38: Since the appearance of Gensokyo residents, rumors have spread that humans have a special way of achieving "evolution" on Europa.
infotexts.randomnews39: Members of the "Painting Skin" cult have been increasingly active, frequently appearing in areas inhabited by kappa, but there are no signs of painting skin parasites.
infotexts.randomnews40: The number of ghosts on the route continues to increase.
infotexts.randomnews41: The Myouren Temple claims it will handle the UFO incidents as soon as possible.
infotexts.randomnews42: Some have encountered a large number of strange entities on the route. Some say they are light spheres, others say they are UFOs, with no consensus yet.
infotexts.randomnews43: The kappa heavy industry team has established new supply stations in multiple locations.
infotexts.randomnews44: Hieda no Akyuu's popularity among the residents of Europa is rising, with people proud to own a copy of "Kuwamokusa."
infotexts.randomnews45: Some claim to have seen a green-haired girl swimming towards the abyss without a diving suit. The authenticity remains to be verified.
infotexts.randomnews46: A group of terrorists claiming to be from the Moon attacked several supply stations. The kappa heavy industry team vows to uncover the truth.
infotexts.randomnews47: Recently, many witnesses have reported seeing strange lights emanating from ruins from a distance, disappearing shortly afterward. The tengu task force has stated that it has intervened in the investigation.
infotexts.randomnews48: A shrine maiden, who prefers to remain nameless, has stated that she will sell protective charms to captains at a low price.
infotexts.randomnews49: The "Multi-flavored Juice" designed by Eientei has become popular everywhere.
infotexts.randomnews50: Remilia has publicly announced her intention to conquer Europa.
infotexts.randomnews51: The source of the earthquake has been found; it turns out to be just a forgotten key stone.
infotexts.randomnews52: The shrine donation boxes have been set up at major sites; the public is welcome to contribute.
infotexts.randomnews53: More spiritual plants have been successfully cultivated on Europa on a small scale.
infotexts.randomnews54: Several alchemists have complained about the inefficiency of the ritual platform, needing a higher degree of automation.
infotexts.randomnews55: A new metal, "Stellar Base Metal," has been discovered. Many scientists previously guided by Patchouli are still studying its properties.
infotexts.randomnews56: There are still a few UFOs scattered along the flight path.
infotexts.randomnews57: Many residents have reported that items in their homes have mysteriously disappeared. The suspect seems to be a blonde human wearing black and white clothing.
infotexts.randomnews58: A change in faith has appeared among the clowns. The existence of a fairy claiming to be from Hell seems closely related to this.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Grunt_Security_Ten: A Tengu patrolling the Youkai Mountain. It has excellent vision and smell, and can instantly detect intruders.
There is a non-human presence nearby.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Flowers_Of_Four_Se: A youkai living in Gensokyo. Possesses the ability to manipulate flowers. Strives to have flowers blooming throughout the entire year.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Naivete_Koma_Inu: She is a Koma Inu, but actually embodies both lion and Koma Inu traits, being a dual-natured divine beast. Both the fierce and calm aspects of a divine beast coexist within her.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Lion: Spring-like and courageous, with a somewhat sloppy strong enemy vibe. Also has a relaxed character feel.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Koma_Inu: She is set to be one divine beast represented by a person, but this does not mean multiple personalities.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aunn_Koma_Inu_Othe: A divine beast is guarding you nearby, giving you confidence.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Younger_Sister_Of_: Flandre is the younger sister of Remilia Scarlet. She likes her sister Remilia but is rarely seen with her. Usually cared for by maid Sakuya Izayoi along with Remilia.
infotexts.talentdescription.MomiziTalent:
While wearing Momiji's Outfit+, you have increased resistance to bites and stings. 
Maximum health increased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖. 
When enemies are nearby, you gain alertness and increased ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ walking speed, ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ swimming speed, and ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ melee attack speed. 
After being attacked, physical damage resistance and ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ melee attack damage are briefly increased.
infotexts.talentdescription.AunnTalent:
While wearing Aunn's Outfit+, you have higher resistance to spiritual pressure and mental attacks. 
Physical damage (excluding spiritual pressure) and bites inflicted by non-friendly characters (red-named creatures) increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. 
Damage to friendly characters is reduced to ‖color:gui.green‖half‖end‖. 
Each time you cycle, you can choose between two states: Lion / Koma Inu. 
Koma Inu: Crew members near you gain the effect of ‖color:gui.orange‖Guardian Beast‖end‖, increasing ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage and mental illness‖end‖ resistance, and reducing damage to friendly characters by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, recovering faster from ‖color:gui.orange‖spiritual pressure and bites‖end‖, and increasing maximum health by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. 
Lion: ‖color:gui.orange‖Physical damage‖end‖ resistance reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage, attack speed, and movement speed‖end‖ increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖‖, and damage to non-friendly characters (red-named creatures) increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent:
When you wear the Flandre's Outfit+, your resistance to physical damage and burns is very low. Additionally, physical damage received increases by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖, and burn damage received increases by ‖color:gui.green‖70%‖end‖. 
The lower your health, the higher the armor penetration of the damage you deal, up to ‖color:gui.green‖66.6%‖end‖. 
Repair speed decreases by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. 
You recover faster from ‖color:gui.orange‖bleeding‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖blood loss‖end‖. 
‖color:gui.orange‖Medical skill‖end‖ is permanently reduced by ‖color:gui.red‖160‖end‖. 
Quadruple Clones: You can have three additional talents, which can be acquired by crafting and using the ‖color:gui.red‖Flandre Doll‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent2: While wearing Flandre's Outfit+, attack damage increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖‖, and if health is below 49.5%, increased by an additional ‖color:gui.green‖49.5%‖‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent3: When you wear the Flandre Outfit+, your movement speed increases by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, skill gain speed increases by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, and your resistance to debuffs increases by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ when there are living beings nearby. If a friendly crew member is close by, your medical skill increases by ‖color:gui.green‖66‖end‖ points.
infotexts.talentdescription.FlandreTalent4: While wearing Flandre's Outfit+ and pressing Ctrl, a magical shield will continuously generate around you, blocking all ranged barrages (including your own) from all creatures. During this time, your movement speed is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖, attack damage is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖140%‖end‖, and skill level is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖45%‖end‖, but resistance returns to normal levels. The shield lasts for ‖color:gui.green‖15‖end‖ seconds. If the remaining shield time is greater than ‖color:gui.green‖0‖end‖, it restores ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ second of duration per second. Otherwise, the duration will reset after ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖ seconds once time runs out.
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Skirt: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at the Hakugyokuro. Half human, half ghost, half alive, half dead, half solid, half ephemeral. But she has two swords.\n————“Touhou: Subterranean Animism”‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Skirt_Plus: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener working at the Hakugyokuro. Half human, half ghost, half alive, half dead, half solid, half ephemeral. But she has two swords.\n————“Touhou: Subterranean Animism”‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Yuka_gear: ‖color:117,128,110,255‖Yuka lives in the sunflower field and eliminates any humans and youkai that disturb the area. Due to her long life, she rarely leaves the flower fields.\nShe is very fond of seasonal flowers, aiming to have flowers blooming throughout the entire year in the natural surroundings she lives in.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Yuka_Plus: ‖color:117,128,110,255‖Yuka lives in the sunflower field and eliminates any humans and youkai that disturb the area. Due to her long life, she rarely leaves the flower fields.\nShe is very fond of seasonal flowers, aiming to have flowers blooming throughout the entire year in the natural surroundings she lives in.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Aunn_gear: ‖color:162,190,160,255‖Aunn will find, cling to, and guard places that might gather human faith. She usually does not show herself and only attacks when hostile beings appear, but she often loses due to her lack of strength.\nShe particularly attracts frogs in the summer.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Aunn_Plus: ‖color:162,190,160,255‖Aunn will find, cling to, and guard places that might gather human faith. She usually does not show herself and only attacks when hostile beings appear, but she often loses due to her lack of strength.\nShe particularly attracts frogs in the summer.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Momizi_gear: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Stays idle inside the Nine-Tailed Waterfall during the day. Since there are few intruders from the Youkai Mountain, she is usually quite idle and will often play shogi with nearby kappas.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Momizi_Plus: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Stays idle inside the Nine-Tailed Waterfall during the day. Since there are few intruders from the Youkai Mountain, she is usually quite idle and will often play shogi with nearby kappas.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Flandre_gear: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Flandre lives in the basement of the Scarlet Devil Mansion and rarely goes outside. Although the others in the mansion restrict her due to her dangerous abilities and mental issues, Flandre actually enjoys staying in the mansion.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Flandre_Plus: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Flandre lives in the basement of the Scarlet Devil Mansion and rarely goes outside. Although the others in the mansion restrict her due to her dangerous abilities and mental issues, Flandre actually enjoys staying in the mansion.‖color:end‖\n(Includes Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Yuka_Parasol: A parasol emitting the scent of flowers. Its owner must really love gardening.
infotexts.entitydescription.Flandre_Doll: Press and hold the right mouse button to use it, and it will randomly unlock one of Flandre's three additional talents.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Thunder_Drum_Bo: The Elegance of the sky? I see it as a storm. (Pulse Laser Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Fantasy_Wind: Flying freely in the sky is so cool. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Celestial_Decay: Seems to be a sign that appears when a celestial being is about to die. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tengu_Longsword: A longsword used by tengu, lightweight yet powerful.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tengu_Shield: A small shield used by tengu, able to block most barrages. Due to its compact size and light weight, it is widely used.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tengu_Shield_Huge: A large shield used by tengu, capable of withstanding enemy attacks. However, due to its weight and size, it severely impacts the user’s barrage firing speed and makes sword usage cumbersome.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Rippling: Reportedly a weapon crafted by a deity using a special spiritual bead from Europa, but this one is clearly a version adapted for the environment of Europa and lacks the deity's style.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Sorrow_Ter: Internal negative emotions are causing your mental state to become unstable.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Expellees_Canaan: A technique for driving away invaders. Makes the small you look very big.\nAs expected of Momiji! Please continue to protect us as a guard.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bite: Though there is no visible wound, the pain at the site cannot be relieved.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rippling_Ef: The supernatural ripples cause your body to become uncontrollable, and your mind to become dazed.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Pressur: You perished due to the collapse of your body caused by excessive spiritual pressure.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Phoenix_Burn: You were burned to ashes by the eternal flames of the Phoenix.
infotexts.loadingscreentip: Try Kyushu Arsenal and the T.S.M. missions!
Buying materials is usually faster than trying to craft them from zero.
Some materials are particularly expensive, but their alchemical efficiency is quite high.
infotexts.talentdescription.Savant:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Akyuu's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
After completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission‖end‖，receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition‖end‖. 
After completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission without casualties‖end‖，receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition‖end‖. 
‖color:gui.red‖Reading [Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition] or [Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition] will provide NO effects to yourself.‖end‖ 
After completing a round, receive an additional ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ experience. 
Skill gain speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖ 
Effectiveness of healing effects is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Crafting and Deconstructing speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Movement speed is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ and maximum health is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ 
Melee damage is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Rate of fire is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ 
Combine "Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition", "Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition" and "Aya's News Report" into ‖color:gui.red‖"Historic Records of Gensokyo"‖end‖ at the processing table. 
Reading this new book will give you all the effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.Symposium_Of_Post_Myst: Wisdom, courage and benevolence are the most important virtues. Let them be gathered here.
infotexts.entityname.Perfect_Memento_In_Strict_Sen: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Perfect_Memento_In_Str: An abandoned world where humans don't record history. Humans are afraid of monsters and can't understand their true nature.\nIf we could better understand monsters, create countermeasures and avoid dangerous places, we could live without fear.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Europa_Customs: Both worlds are undergoing tremendous change.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mysterious_Mountain:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖+50%‖end‖ 
After completing any mission, receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya's News Report‖end‖, if ‖color:gui.orange‖Medical and Helm‖end‖ levels are over 70，receive an additional ‖color:gui.orange‖Press Card‖end‖. 
While in dry environments, gain ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ increased movement speed, ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain speed and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ attack speed. 
When a crewmate is within 20 meters of you, you gain ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ additional experience. 

‖color:150,150,150,255‖"Huh? My job? Well, as a journalist, I like to record interesting events. I don't really post news regularly, at most 5 times a month. I don't post many things either, but they are of quality! At least the inhabitants of Gensokyo can enjoy it alongside a cup of tea."
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Press_Card: Proof of Aya's reporter status. After use at the outpost, you can call Akyuu or other clients.
infotexts.entitydescription.Scarlet_Devil_Mansion: The red aura looks like it's burning, but it doesn’t seem to be fire. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Precious_Metal: A highly precious magical metal, a third-stage product of alchemical transformation. Compared to Ether Base Metal, it has a high element conversion efficiency and is used for more important synthesis.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Potion_Pu: A magic potion that purifies alien infections in the body, quickly killing alien life forms like the Husks and Symbiotes.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Cyber_Homing_Am: Through the combination of magic and technology, the Kappas and Patchouli sacrificed some firerate in exchange of greater power and a rechargeable system.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Pouch: A belt made from magical materials, which quickly became popular among mages upon release. When paired with a magical mantle, it maximizes the user’s magical power. It also includes three elemental bottle slots, allowing the user to place different elemental bottles to provide various healing effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.Camellia_Hair_Accessor: A beautiful camellia hair accessory made using real flowers, resulting in high craftsmanship. Wearing this will completely improve forgetfulness.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Aya_Camera: An old-fashioned camera that requires full manual operation. Compared to the previous camera used by Aya, this one makes the subject unconsciously pose in front of the lens rather than removing barrages. The only drawback is that the immobilization time for large enemies is relatively short.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Aya_Maple_Film: An old film, but its excellent craftsmanship allows it to record important images even on Europa. It can freeze enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Seed: "What do you mean growing sunflowers is impossible here? Do you even know who I am?" -Kazami Yuuka
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_gear: ‖color:90,80,100,255‖Whenever she sees others enthusiastically working, she can't help but want to secretly sabotage them, which is her nature. She once lived leisurely underground but returned to the surface after the geyser upheavals. She has now joined the Myouren Temple and trains under Byakuren Hijiri, but she is somewhat out of place among other yokai.‖end‖\n (Includes a scanner slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_Plus:
‖color:90,80,100,255‖When she sees other people absorbed in their activities, she can't help but to mess with them.
Having lived leisurely underground, she emerged to the surface after troubles with some geysers.

A certain community claims her "Nuenis" is amazing.‖end‖
(Built-in Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal01: A petal with very sharp edges, handle with care (used in the medical interface)
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal02: A petal so light it is almost weightless; it will disappear with a gust of wind (used in the medical interface)
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal03: A petal that seems alive, with a slight vibration when held (used in the medical interface)
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Magic_Potion_Candy: A magic potion that can heal wounds. Copious amounts of sugar were added to mask the terrible original flavor. Because of this, it's very popular with kids.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Laevatein: A massive sword that always burns stronger than the sun, no matter what.\nUsing this sword consumes the lifeforce of the user. Once lifeforce consumption reaches 100%, death is certain. \n"Ice cream? For me? Thanks." - Unknown
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mysterious_Pear: Mysterious pearl that exudes a strange aura. You feel it could enhance powers when you hold it.\nWhen you look closely, it looks like there's a lake inside, with something that looks like a head poking out of it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Eternal_Night_B: An imitation of Eirin's bow, its power depending of the arrows used. An imitation is just that, at the end of the day.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Metal_Arr: These arrows made of magic metals can restrict movement of its target. Assuming it hits, anyways.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_gear: Clownpiece is a subordinate of Hecatia Lapislazuli. While very loyal to Hecatia, she also has her own opinions and refers to Hecatia as "Master." After the events of *Memories of the Lost* (Kōjūden), she was sent by Hecatia to live in Gensokyo, where she met the three fairy sisters Sunny Milk, Luna Child, and Star Sapphire, with whom she enjoyed playing pranks. She also subsequently met other notable fairies such as Cirno.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_Plus: Clownpiece is a subordinate of Hecatia Lapislazuli. While very loyal to Hecatia, she also has her own opinions and refers to Hecatia as "Master." After the events of *Memories of the Lost* (Kōjūden), she was sent by Hecatia to live in Gensokyo, where she met the three fairy sisters Sunny Milk, Luna Child, and Star Sapphire, with whom she enjoyed playing pranks. She also subsequently met other notable fairies such as Cirno.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Starbow_Break: "What do you mean there's a safe spot?" (Flak Cannon ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mysterious_Pear: There seem to be some weird pearls out there or something. Honestly? I don't fucking know anymore.
infotexts.entitydescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pea: Contains important data, possibly key clues for investigating anomalies.
infotexts.entityname.Touhou_Missions_Collection_Nu: Akyuu's Mission Log - The Mystic Ripples and Endless Night
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Missions_Collec: Records valuable data that can help you recall past battles.
Can be synthesized with other logs at the Altar to create a master log, allowing you to undertake all currently known missions (cannot re-challenge story missions).
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Aya_Token: Right-click to greatly enhance physical abilities. Effective only for Tengus.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Medical_Eff: You feel as if your knowledge slips away.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Scarlet_Long_Night: Even casual remarks may alter the fate of those around you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Aya_Camera_: Feels as if your very soul is frozen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal01: Power within becomes more focused, resulting in higher damage
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal02: The body becomes light, drifting with the wind like petals
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal03: Vibrant life force is active within, making the body more resistant to injury
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: She seems to enjoy making people scared and afraid, making up legends about herself.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nue_Weapons: The Youkai at the Myouren Temple revolve around the Holy White Lotus. As a new member, she seems to be a little out of touch with them.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Flandre_Weapons: Flandre Scarlet is the younger sister of Remilia Scarlet. She admires her older sister, but they are rarely seen together. On a daily basis, she is taken care of by the maid head Sakuya Izayoi along with Remilia.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Destruction_Of_Mu: Everything has a most important part known as the “Mu.” To destroy something, simply focus your force on it, and it can be easily destroyed.
infotexts.afflictionname.Unconfirmed_Fantasy_Flyin: The Nightmare of the Heian Period
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: While HP is below 50%, damage resistance is increased.
infotexts.talentdescription.Lord_Of_Flowers:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Yuuka's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Melee Damage is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
Each round, receive a Sunflower Seed that randomly drops different petals. Each petal provides bonuses after use. 
Can block incoming projectiles with the Parasol.
infotexts.talentdescription.NueTalent:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Nue's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Debuff Resistance is massively increased. 
Buff duration is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
Movement speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ when HP is below 50% 
Resistance to debuffs, physical injuries and burn is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ when HP is below 50% 
When you kill [amount] enemies, you'll receive bonuses that depend on the amount of enemies killed. 156个：Skill gain speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Movement speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 312个：Experience gained is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Max health is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 468个：Duration of buffs is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Attack speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 624个：Attack damage is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Destruction_O: Your internal "Mu" is completely shattered, resulting in death at its source.
infotexts.missiondescription.FindHoujuuNue: UFO Romance in the Night Sky
infotexts.missionmessage.FindHoujuuNue: "Did you know the distance between Earth and its moon is 380,000 kilometers? Humans once launched a satellite called "Torifune", which is now stuck at the halfway point. \nIt used to carry various animals and plants to gather data about terraforming, but due to an unexplained computer failure, it became static, forming a triangle between the moon and earth. \nAs to what happened to the life inside, a certain Youkai claims the ecosystem has mutated, but nobody knows for certain.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A group of ignorant individuals who sought a new form of life succumbed to temptation and eventually degenerated into half-human, half-demon monsters. To protect the justice and peace of Gensokyo, someone has commissioned you to deal with them and detonate the reactor, completely destroying this unclean place.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Turning humans into youkai is a grave sin. Let Lady Shiki take care of that.
infotexts.missiondescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pe: Many people have reported seeing unidentified flashes in nearby ruins. Investigate to find out what’s going on.
Some miners discovered unusual flashes deep inside a cave and never returned from their investigation. We'll pay you well to find out what happened.
infotexts.missiondescription.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Cra: Maliciously infested lifeforms are hiding in a cave nearby. In order to prevent the spread of this infection, the nest must be purged.
infotexts.missionmessage.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Crawler: The potential mutation was successfully eradicated.
infotexts.talentdescription.Life_And_Death_Half_Ha: While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Youmu's Outfit+‖end‖, Melee damage dealt is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.orange‖walking speed‖end‖ is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖36%‖end‖. Based on your weapon skill level, increase its ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖ by 10%. \nHolding both ‖color:gui.red‖Hakurouken‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖Roukanken‖end‖ simultaneously will grant a large damage bonus and further increase walking speed.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Penglai_Jade_Br: Legend has it that the true Hōrai Jade Branch comes from Hōrai Mountain in the Eastern Sea, with silver as the branch, gold as the stem, and the fruit being jade. Whether this one is real or not is unknown. It contains a hidden gap where placing a dazzling Dragon Jade can activate its danmaku firing ability.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Brilliant_Drago: A piece of jade emitting magical power, seemingly closely related to the Hōrai Jade Branch.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Blue_Rose: A unique revolving handgun with two barrels arranged vertically.
infotexts.entitydescription.Color_Up_Bullet: A very special high-explosive bullet that can effectively stun small enemies.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Reiki_Side_Ef: Your internal spiritual energy is polluted and eroded, collapsing from the inside out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_Low: Slight pain from frostbite, but not too severe
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Freeze_High: The frostbite is severe, will not heal by itself, needs prompt treatment
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Touhou_Freeze: Your breath has completely stopped, and you have turned into a frozen sculpture.
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Yousei_Primary: After completing any mission, gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ experience and a ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Apple Flavor)‖end‖

Increase ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖, and increase ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖. When other crew members are nearby, these effects are doubled
Nearby crew members gain a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ bonus and ‖color:gui.orange‖25%‖end‖ resistance to ‖color:gui.orange‖oxygen deficiency‖end‖

When health is above ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, increase ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖repair speed‖end‖, and gain an additional ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Peach Flavor)‖end‖ after completing a mission.
Increase ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ swimming speed, increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ experience gain

When the submarine is attacked, increase ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ for ‖color:gui.green‖6‖end‖ seconds.
When there are no hostile creatures nearby, speed up the recovery of ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burns, and bleeding‖end‖

Each time you complete a mission, you gain Mutation Energy. Mutation Energy can provide up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ bonus to ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ bonus to ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖. Unlocks recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Mutated Candy‖end‖

Skill levels are averaged two by two, and based on the average, get the corresponding bonuses of ‖color:gui.green‖8%‖end‖: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Driving level + Weapon operation‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖; ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mechanical level + Electrical engineering‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Repair speed‖end‖; ‖color:gui.yellow‖Medical level + Magical ability‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack damage‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_Fun: After completing any mission, receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Candy (Yuzu Flavor)‖end‖. Using different candies in the medical interface provides various additional benefits for 150 seconds each: ‖color:gui.yellow‖Apple flavor‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Speed‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖150 points‖end‖; ‖color:gui.yellow‖Peach flavor‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Max HP‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Increased by 15%‖end‖; ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lemon flavor‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack speed‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Increased by 10%‖end‖; ‖color:gui.yellow‖Yuzu flavor‖end‖: ‖color:gui.orange‖Attack damage‖end‖‖color:gui.green‖Increased by 10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Insouciance: If there are no hostile creatures nearby, accelerate the recovery of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Physical damage, burn, and bleeding‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Emergency_Avoid: If there are more than ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ hostile creatures nearby and your health is below ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖, ‖color:gui.orange‖Movement speed‖end‖ increases by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.orange‖Stun resistance‖end‖ increases by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖.
