infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Lone_Yousei: If there are no other crew members nearby, the effect of using medical items is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖, and resistance to ‖color:gui.yellow‖debuffs‖end‖ is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Candy_World: Increase the quality of manufactured items by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖. At the end of the cycle, receive one of each of the four candies, and unlock recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Cannon Plus, Sugar-coated Cannonball, Super Candy‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Yousei_Alliance: While wearing the ‖color:gui.orange‖Fairy Outfit+‖end‖, increase the effect of the corresponding outfit by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Behind_The_Mutation: Each time you kill a creature, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance of increasing your mutation energy by ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ points. When mutation energy exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖10‖end‖, you gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖. When mutation energy exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖20‖end‖, gain ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖burn resistance‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖stun resistance‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Cute_Prank: Each time you kill a creature, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ chance to increase your mutation energy by ‖color:gui.green‖2‖end‖ points. When mutation energy exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖30‖end‖, increase your ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ max HP, and the firing speed of controlled turrets increases by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Eastern_And_Little_Nat: When Mutation Energy exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖40‖end‖, increases ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage‖end‖, reduces ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ of ‖color:gui.orange‖physical damage‖end‖ taken, and grants a ‖color:gui.green‖15 point‖end‖ bonus to all skills. Unlocks recipes: ‖color:gui.orange‖Sword of the Ice Hero, Hellfire Torch‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Magical_Assista: If there is a magician on the ship, provide them with ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖skill gain speed‖end‖, and receive an additional ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ money per cycle.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Self_Made: Complete any mission to receive one piece of ‖color:gui.orange‖Etherium Metal‖end‖. If no one dies, also receive an additional ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ experience.
infotexts.talentdescription.Quiet_And_Well_Behaved: Increases ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ repair speed and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖maximum health‖end‖; this bonus also applies to spellcasters on the ship.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Vibrant: When in the same room as the spellcasters on the ship, you will not die from pain.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Further_Study: Increases processing table and decomposer use speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and drug manufacturing speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Child_Of_Nature: Earn an additional candy of each type per round. When mutation energy exceeds ‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖, you are immune to water pressure. Unlocks recipe: ‖color:gui.orange‖Candy Essence‖end‖. Candy Essence allows fairy class to acquire weakened versions of five spellcaster talents (including three ultimate talents).
infotexts.talentname.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Unlocked_: Gensokyo Diving Gear - Child of Nature
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain 2 points in all skills and magic abilities at the end of each round.
infotexts.talentdescription.MEID_Unlocked_Yousei: The more enemies around, the higher the damage dealt and the higher your resistance. Damage can go up to 30%, and resistance up to 6%. Unlocks recipes: Focused Arc Emitter and Thunderstone.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet_Youse: After each round, if no one dies, recover a bit of physical damage, burn, bleeding, blood loss, and the Grim Reaper's tax for everyone.
infotexts.talentname.Talents_Magician_Primary03_Yo: Who's Afraid of Flying? - Child of Nature
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increases movement speed by 5% and reduces physical damage received by 5% while in the water.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Candy_Apple: Candy favored by fairies, also used as a crafting material.
Candy favored by fairies, also used as a crafting material.
Candy favored by fairies, also used as a crafting material.
Candy favored by fairies, also used as a crafting material.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mutation_Candy: Enhances mutation energy when used on the health page.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Super_Candy: Special candy with remarkable healing effects, mixed with four flavors.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Candy_Cannon: A handheld cannon that fires candy-coated shells; don't be deceived by the sweet talk.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sugar_Coated_Ca: Sweet-tasting, but the danger hidden within cannot be ignored.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Candy_Pouch: A portable pocket designed for storing candy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Fairy_Of_Hell: She follows Hecatia's orders, filling the quiet sea with fairies she brought from hell.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Piece_Weapons: When the demoness holds her torch and channels power, those who see the torch's flame will go insane.
infotexts.talentdescription.PieceTalent: While wearing the demoness outfit+, your resistance to burning is slightly higher. The higher your madness, ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage, attack speed, and damage to allies‖end‖ will be higher. ‖color:gui.orange‖attack damage and attack speed‖end‖ are increased by up to ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.orange‖damage to allies‖end‖ can be increased by up to ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. \nThe higher the target's madness, the higher the damage dealt to them, up to ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cirno_gear: Sometimes even in summer, extreme cold phenomena can occur near the lake. The fairy encountered at such times is likely an ice fairy. She is the leader of the fairies near Misty Lake and is stronger than other fairies.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cirno_Plus: Sometimes even in summer, extreme cold phenomena can occur near the lake. The fairy encountered at such times is likely an ice fairy. She is the leader of the fairies near Misty Lake and is stronger than other fairies.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Fairy_Of_Ice: Among fairies, she is a combative type. Her head is a bit clumsy. However, she is just a child after all.
infotexts.talentdescription.CirnoTalent: While wearing Cirno's Outfit+, your resistance to burning is very low. Deals an additional ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ freezing damage. Skill gain speed decreases by ‖color:gui.red‖50%‖end‖. When in water, increases ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖attack speed‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖, and continues to heal some injuries. \nWhen using magical melee weapons, each attack adds 4~8 points of freezing damage, and this effect increases with the difficulty of weapon crafting.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Frozen_Frog: A block of ice exuding a chilling cold, with a frog sealed inside. Inserting a ‖color:gui.yellow‖Perfect Snowflake‖end‖ can activate its barrage-firing ability.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Perfect_Snowfla: A perfectly hexagonal snowflake, containing pure cold energy.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Cirno_Weapons: She is a leader among the fairies near the lake and is stronger than other fairies.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Pouch_Medical_Ex: An upgraded version of the elemental belt, sacrificing magical defense performance for more medical storage space without altering its magical properties.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Candy_Essence: When used by fairies, it grants additional talents, up to five.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Elixir_Of_Pengl: A miraculous medicine that can bring people back to life and instantly heal injuries. (Using it will make the player unable to control their character after revival, use with caution)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Kappa_Welding_T: An efficient repair tool that can use welding fuel cans, or specialized ‖color:gui.orange‖Fix Foam Cans‖end‖, and can also be equipped with weapon accessories. Highly praised and on sale.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nuclear_Battery: Can be used in Kappa welding tools. When equipped, it allows the welding tool to fire repair rays for remote hull repairs.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Fix_Foamg_Tank: Highly compressed Fix Foam,especially used for hull repairs with Kappa welding tools. It is quite durable and speeds up repair by about 40%. \n—— “Even though tools are good, don’t forget to improve your own abilities.”
infotexts.talentdescription.Casket_Of_Star:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Marisa's Outfit+‖end‖, recovery from ‖color:gui.green‖physical damage and burning‖end‖ is faster and resistance is higher: 
Damage dealt increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. 
Attack speed of ranged weapons increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 
15% chance to find ‖color:gui.green‖《Magic Book》‖end‖ each time you open a shipwreck container. 
Wearing Marisa’s hat slightly increases resistance and attack damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nuclear_Energy_: A technological product from Kappa Heavy Industries, a crystallization of advanced nuclear fusion technology that can fire scorching lasers, easily melting obstacles in the way.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Kappa_Multi_Fun: A simplified repair tool refined by Kappa multiple times, capable of repairing both mechanical and electrical equipment. For skilled hands, repair efficiency is greatly improved. However, due to secrecy in manufacturing methods, it is only obtained from merchants.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Hellfire_Torch: A torch imbued with hellfire. The unstable energy will affect the holder's sanity, and only a hell fairy can adapt to the torch's magic.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A group of fully transformed youkai has settled here. To prevent this from happening again, someone has hired you to eliminate them, set an example, and detonate the reactor to completely destroy this unclean place.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Humans turning into youkai is a grave sin. Let Lady Shiki properly educate them.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Love_Maze: A bow-shaped weapon fully formed from fire magic, but it shoots scorching barrages. The lower the enemy's health, the higher the damage dealt. After three consecutive normal shots, the next shot temporarily becomes a triple shot.
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Gear: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a kappa, she is highly sensitive to business opportunities. Every time a major festival or gathering is held in Gensokyo, kappa, including herself, are often seen setting up stalls to sell their goods.\n————《Bestiary》‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Plus: ‖color:52,94,60,255‖As a kappa, she is highly sensitive to business opportunities. Every time a major festival or gathering is held in Gensokyo, kappa, including herself, are often seen setting up stalls to sell their goods.\n————《Bestiary》‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Candid_Friend: A kappa who excels in business and is obsessed with hoarding wealth.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nitori_Weapons: She is quite shy and has a timid side. When alone, she will immediately flee if a human or other youkai approaches. However, among her companions, she shows a bright and lively side.
infotexts.talentdescription.Kappa_Pororoca:
When you are wearing the ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Nitori Outfit+‖end‖, 
While in water and with ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electrical Engineering‖end‖ both above ‖color:gui.green‖60‖end‖, you slowly recover some health. 
You gain an additional ‖color:gui.green‖70%‖end‖ swimming speed. 
Based on the combined levels of ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electrical Engineering‖end‖, repair speed and hull repair speed increase by ‖color:gui.green‖16%‖end‖. 
Based on the current level of ‖color:gui.orange‖Mechanical Engineering‖end‖, increase ranged attack damage by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 
When opening sunken ship containers, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ chance to find simple parts and a ‖color:gui.green‖5%‖end‖ chance to find precision parts. 
When opening beacon station containers, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance to find precision parts. 
Repaired equipment becomes significantly harder to break. 
You get a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ discount when trading ships.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Simple_Parts: Parts salvaged from discarded equipment, used in the crafting of some tools.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Precision_Parts: Usable materials salvaged from unnoticed corners.
infotexts.afflictionname.FlandreTalent4_Effect_CD: Cage of the Bird - Remaining Shield Duration
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: The alchemy lab lost a batch of important materials here, so they are offering a high reward to any captain willing to retrieve these resources.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: Looks like we arrived too late—the resources have all turned into useless scrap in their hands. Let’s hope the alchemy lab can accept this outcome.
